mapper.select: SELECT * FROM income_record where sys_user_id=#{userId} AND date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO income_record( id, sys_user_id, user_type, next_user_id, next_user_type, amount, transaction_amount, update_date, create_date, income_type, user_identify_number, next_user_identify_number, user_name, next_user_name, transaction_id, user_mobile, next_user_mobile, parent_relation, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sysUserId}, #{userType}, #{nextUserId}, #{nextUserType}, #{amount}, #{transactionAmount}, #{updateDate}, #{createDate}, #{incomeType}, #{identifyNumber}, #{nextUserIdentifyNumber}, #{nickName}, #{nextUserNickName}, #{transactionId}, #{mobile}, #{nextUserMobile}, #{parentRelation}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT ,u.nickname,u.mobile,u.identify_number FROM income_record i,sys_user u WHERE 1=1 AND i.sys_user_id = u.id ORDER BY i.create_date DESC

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(amount),0) FROM income_record WHERE income_type = 'instance'
AND sys_user_id=#{userId}
SELECT * FROM income_record WHERE sys_user_id = #{userId} and amount != 0 ORDER BY update_date DESC limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
SELECT * FROM income_record WHERE transaction_id = #{transactionId}
SELECT m.* FROM month_transaction_record m
